sections.heading: barrier, defined.Accessibility barrier shall mean anything which impedes entry into, exit from, or use of any building or facility by all people

sections.text:
58-207.02.Accessibility barrier, defined.

Accessibility barrier shall mean anything which impedes entry into, exit from, or use of any building or facility by all people.

SourceLaws 1992, LB 1001, ยง 7.
